unnormalised: Regarding the query on company registration, please note that every registered entity in India must have a GSTIN. Your companyâ€™s PAN no. is a crucial document. For income tax purposes, ensure your TAN is correctly filed in all TDS returns. Further clarification can be obtained from your local Income Tax Office or by visiting the website. A CIN is also necessary for tracking the registration.
normalised: Regarding the query on company registration, please note that every registered entity in India must have a G-S-T-I-N. Your company's P-A-N number is a crucial document. For income tax purposes, ensure your T-A-N is correctly filed in all T-D-S returns. Further clarification can be obtained from your local Income Tax Office or by visiting the website. A C-I-N is also necessary for tracking the registration.
